relationships.description: Kahn is sending political polling data to Jeffrey Epstein

emotional_indicators: positive assessment of Trump's movement in polls
analysis.purpose: To share current political polling data with Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting Trump's positive movement in various polls
analysis.significance: Shows communication about 2016 presidential election polling between Kahn and Epstein during the campaign season

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - simply sharing polling data

illegal_activity.description: Document contains shared polling data from various news sources, not first-hand illegal activity

details: Contains polling data from multiple media organizations: LA Times, Reuters, Bloomberg, WBUR, KSN News

public_knowledge.context: 2016 presidential election polling data that was publicly available and widely reported

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein with current political polling data showing Donald Trump's positive movement in various state and national polls during the 2016 presidential campaign, highlighting Trump leading in several key metrics.
